post.author: 관리자
post.content:
Hello Members;

The Annual Meeting is just two weeks away.

We need about five or six volunteers to set up the meeting place.

The only requirement is that you have to be at the place

a little earlier, say by 5:15 PM.

Would you be kind enough to help us out please ?

Please write to 'webmaster@coska.com' or 'saewhankim@hanmail.net'

if you are willing to help.

Your consideration is very much appreciated.

Thanks.

SK
post.title: Wanted: Voluteers at the annual meeting.
